09-12-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage amp per stack reduced from 7% to 6%
- Added a brief lockout period on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak to prevent accidental double clicks
08-29-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage amp reduced from 8% to 7% per stack
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage amp visual not showing properly
08-15-2024: - Remastered {{HeroIcon|Hero=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- Revised sounds for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak duration and warp
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage now respects line of sight
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage amp effect now shows on {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket
- Base Bullet Resist increased from -15% to 0%
- Base Spirit Resist reduced from 0% to -15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage Amp per stack reduced from 10% to 8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage T3 changed to +5% Amp Per Stack
- Fixed the camera moving too slowly after teleporting with Cloak
08-01-2024: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket animations: New crouch walk and aim, updated slide animation, and new firing from slide animation.
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket Enchanted Satchel cast and delay sounds
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's Cloak being able to tunnel through some ceilings and out of the world
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Affliction|Size=20}} Affliction damage is dealt over 18s instead of 16s (same total damage, lower DPS)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20}} Enchanter's Satchel T3 changed from Disarms for 2.5s to Applies -40% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate for 4s
07-18-2024: - Updated effects on {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket effects to improve visibility
- Base bullet resistance improved from -20% to -15%
- Base gun damage reduced from 5.6 to 5.0
- Gun damage growth increased from 0.35 to 0.4
07-11-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20}} Enchanter's Satchel duration from 1.5s to 2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20}} Enchanter's Satchel T3 changed to 2.5s Disarm
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20}} Enchanter's Satchel can now be canceled by shooting
06-20-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage base damage reduced from 40 to 35

- Fixed a recent change causing {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20}} Enchanter's Satchel to not play damage at the destination when teleporting with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak
06-13-2024: - Minor improvements to visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Affliction|Size=20}} Affliction cast
06-06-2024: - Added AoE effect to {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage
- Updated weapon buff effect in {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak upgrade
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's Enchanted Satchel delay and explode sounds
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage cast and impact sounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage channel can now be interrupted by casting your other abilities
- Enchanted Satchel cast time reduced from 0.25s to 0.15s
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak speed increased by 7%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak T3 increased from +5 damage to +7
05-23-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage T3 added, now heals {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket for 100% of its damage (33% vs non-heroes)
- Fixed some issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage projectiles getting caught on map geometry
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak pathing improved, it will no longer bounce erratically off map geometry
05-10-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Affliction|Size=20}} Affliction visual and sound effects reworked
- {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket Enchanter’s Satchel visual effects updated
- Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket’s briefcase would stop animating when the duration upgrade was taken
- Gun damage per bullet reduced from 6 to 5.6
